name: injured

B2 hurt or physically harmed: She was told to stay in bed to rest her injured back.
If your feelings are injured, someone has offended or upset you: It's nothing more than injured pride.
More examplesFewer examplesHe's still conscious but he's fairly badly injured.The injured soldier crawled to safety.Several people were injured, two fatally.The hunt for the injured climber continued throughout the night.The air was abuzz with military helicopters, airlifting injured people and equipment.
